feats.name: Ability Improvements
feats.effects: You increase one Ability by 2, or two Abilities by 1, to a maximum of 20.

feats.name: Actor
feats.effects: Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance Checks. Grants Deception Proficiency and Performance Proficiency.

feats.name: Alert
feats.effects: You gain a +5 bonus to Initiative and can't be Surprised.

feats.name: Athlete
feats.effects: Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your jump distance also increases by 50%.

feats.name: Charger
feats.effects: You gain Charger: Weapon Attack and Charger: Shove.

feats.name: Crossbow Expert
feats.effects: When you make crossbow attacks within melee range, the Attack Rolls do not have Disadvantage. Your Piercing Shot also inflicts Gaping Wounds for twice as long.

feats.name: Defensive Duelist
feats.effects: When attacked while wielding a Finesse Weapon you're Proficient with, you can use a reaction to add your Proficiency Bonus to your Armour Class, possibly causing the attack to miss.

feats.name: Dual Wielder
feats.effects: You can use Two-Weapon Fighting even if your weapons aren't Light, and you gain a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wielding a melee weapon in each hand. You cannot dual-wield Heavy Weapons.

feats.name: Dungeon Delver
feats.effects: You gain Advantage on Perception Checks made to detect hidden objects and on Saving Throws made to avoid or resist traps. You gain Resistance to the damage dealt by traps.

feats.name: Durable
feats.effects: Your Constitution increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. You regain full hit points each time you take a Short Rest.

feats.name: Elemental Adept
feats.effects: Your spells ignore Resistance to a damage type of your choice. When you cast spells of that type, you cannot roll a 1. Choose one: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder.

feats.name: Great Weapon Master
feats.effects: When you land a Critical Hit or kill a target with a melee weapon attack, you can make another melee weapon attack as a bonus action that turn. Attacks with Heavy melee weapons can deal +10 damage at the cost of a -5 Attack Roll penalty.

feats.name: Heavily Armoured
feats.effects: You gain Armour Proficiency with Heavy Armour and your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

feats.name: Heavy Armour Master
feats.effects: Your Strength increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Incoming damage from non-magical attacks decreases by 3 while you're wearing heavy armour.

feats.name: Lightly Armoured
feats.effects: You gain Armour Proficiency with Light Armour and your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

feats.name: Lucky
feats.effects: You gain 3 Luck Points to gain Advantage on Attack Rolls, Ability Checks, or Saving Throws, or to make an enemy reroll an Attack Roll.

feats.name: Mage Slayer
feats.effects: When a creature casts a spell within melee range, you have Advantage on any Saving Throw against it, and you can use a reaction to immediately attack the caster. Enemies you hit have Disadvantage on Concentration Saving Throws.

feats.name: Magic Initiate: Bard
feats.effects: Learn 2 Cantrips and 1 Level 1 spell from the Bard spell list. Cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Spellcasting Ability: Charisma.

feats.name: Magic Initiate: Cleric
feats.effects: Learn 2 Cantrips and 1 Level 1 spell from the Cleric spell list. Cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Spellcasting Ability: Wisdom.

feats.name: Magic Initiate: Druid
feats.effects: Learn 2 Cantrips and 1 Level 1 spell from the Druid spell list. Cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Spellcasting Ability: Wisdom.

feats.name: Magic Initiate: Sorcerer
feats.effects: Learn 2 Cantrips and 1 Level 1 spell from the Sorcerer spell list. Cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Spellcasting Ability: Charisma.

feats.name: Magic Initiate: Warlock
feats.effects: Learn 2 Cantrips and 1 Level 1 spell from the Warlock spell list. Cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Spellcasting Ability: Charisma.

feats.name: Magic Initiate: Wizard
feats.effects: Learn 2 Cantrips and 1 Level 1 spell from the Wizard spell list. Cast the Level 1 spell once per Long Rest. Spellcasting Ability: Intelligence.

feats.name: Martial Adept
feats.effects: Learn two manoeuvres from the Battle Master subclass and gain one Superiority Die to fuel them. Regain expended dice after a Short or Long Rest.

feats.name: Medium Armour Master
feats.effects: Wearing Medium Armour no longer imposes Disadvantage on Stealth Checks. The Dexterity bonus to AC increases to +3 instead of +2.

feats.name: Mobile
feats.effects: Your movement speed increases. Difficult terrain doesn’t slow you when Dashing. If you move after a melee attack, you don’t provoke Opportunity Attacks from that target.

feats.name: Moderately Armoured
feats.effects: Gain Proficiency with Medium Armour and shields, and increase Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

feats.name: Observant
feats.effects: Increase Intelligence or Wisdom by 1, to a maximum of 20. Gain +5 to passive Perception and passive Investigation.

feats.name: Performer
feats.effects: Gain Musical Instrument Proficiency and increase Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.

feats.name: Polearm Master
feats.effects: When attacking with a glaive, halberd, quarterstaff, or spear, you can make a bonus action attack with the butt of your weapon and make an Opportunity Attack when a target enters range.

feats.name: Resilient
feats.effects: Increase one Ability by 1, to a maximum of 20, and gain Proficiency in that Ability's Saving Throws.

feats.name: Ritual Caster
feats.effects: Learn two ritual spells of your choice. Requires Intelligence or Wisdom 13+.

feats.name: Savage Attacker
feats.effects: When making weapon attacks, roll damage dice twice and use the higher result.

feats.name: Sentinel
feats.effects: When an enemy within melee range attacks an ally, you can use a reaction to attack that enemy. Gain Advantage on Opportunity Attacks; hit targets can’t move for the rest of their turn.

feats.name: Sharpshooter
feats.effects: Ranged weapon attacks ignore penalties from High Ground Rules. You may take a -5 penalty to Attack Rolls to deal +10 damage.

feats.name: Shield Master
feats.effects: Gain +2 to Dexterity Saving Throws while wielding a shield. When a spell forces a Dexterity Save, you can use a reaction to halve or negate damage.

feats.name: Skilled
feats.effects: Gain Proficiency in 3 Skills of your choice.

feats.name: Spell Sniper
feats.effects: Learn a cantrip. Your spell critical hit range improves by 1 (can stack). Requires Spellcasting ability.

feats.name: Tavern Brawler
feats.effects: Unarmed and improvised weapon attacks add Strength Modifier twice to damage and Attack Rolls. You also gain +1 Strength or Constitution.

feats.name: Tough
feats.effects: Your hit point maximum increases by 2 for every level you have gained.

feats.name: War Caster
feats.effects: Gain Advantage on Saving Throws to maintain Concentration. You can use a reaction to cast Shocking Grasp when a creature leaves melee range.

feats.name: Weapon Master
feats.effects: Gain Proficiency with four weapons of your choice, and increase Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
